title: How to make Dua, and can i ask the same dua multiple times? assimalhakeem JAL
transcript: dua. There are two aspects to this question. One Sheikh, first we praise Allah, Allahumma lakal hamd, then we send salutations on the Prophet and then we make, so can I make one dua like O Allah give me a car five times, then I make another dua, O Allah give me a beautiful wife. I say this only two times. Yes, yes, yes you can, you can. You can say
